Title: Thad Hoskin | Developer
Name: Thad Hoskin
Description: Hi, I'm Thad! I recently graduated Coder Academy. Experience in JS, MERN, Ruby, Ruby on Rails, HTML5, CSS3, RSpec and Cypress e2e testing. Agile methodology and solving problems. Feel free to check out my GitHub!
When i'm away from the computer, i like to play basketball, run, and drink coffee.

Recently have spent time working with Kalysys, integrating social media platforms with their software.
I am passionate about coding and have enjoyed the challenges that come with it everyday
I love keeping fit, eating healthy, and now... coding.
WorkContent: I am currently a full time Intern at Kalysys Software
